name: Atera Redux zine issue 3: Cursed Items: things to avoid. A safety manual.
name_original: Atera Redux zine issue 3: Cursed Items: things to avoid. A safety manual.
description: The third installment of the Atera Redux zine has arrived! This issue includes 50 original cursed items you might encounter on the continent of Harcourt. Each item comes with its own original illustrations. The items are not only compatible with the most popular ttrpg system (5e), but also the Fate and Mazes RPG systems.
